TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit GeneralTransform3DCollection extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D>, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

Docs.summary: Represents an ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation. **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the GeneralTransform3DCollection class provides several special features: GeneralTransform3DCollection objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread safe. For more information about the different features provided by objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). GeneralTransform3DCollection is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). ## XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMoreGeneralTransform3DObjectElements* One or more objects, declared using object element syntax.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this collection, making deep copies of this object's values.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
Clone is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection CloneCurrentValue() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this collection object, making deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is .
